documentation.creator: Ciucardel Vasile Costinel
documentation.title: Customer Call Center
documentation.shortDescription: An agent based model of a customer call center with two branches: Car-Stereo Products branch and Other-Products branch.

ol.li: Arriving calls first connect to a telephone switch.
If the number of calls currently on hold is greater than ten, the caller receives a busy signal and immediately hangs up.
Other-wise, the call is delivered to an automated interactive voice response (IVR) unit.
The caller is asked to, “Dial one for car-stereo products; Dial two for all other products” and the call is routed accordingly.
The call then waits in the appropriate queue until the first calls receptionist becomes available.
Finally the call is processed and the caller hangs up.

source.span: Introduction to Simulation by R.G. Ingalls, in Proceedings of the 2009 Winter Simulation Conference.

GlobalFunction.name: computeDesiredDepartment

documentation.description: Message type used by the customer to "say" I close this call (the time he planed for speaking is finished).
Event type used by the receptionist to inform environment that thus call is closed. Job with customer is finished.

Customer Caller agents are placing calls at random time intervals to the Place Call Unit. Their calls can be rejected by the Place Call Unit or redirected to the specific branch via the IVR Unit, to wait for a receptionist from that branch to answer.

ReactionRule.name: WaitTimeExpired_Rule
ReactionRule.documentation: If the desired waiting time of the customer expires (the current simulation step - the time was intialized the call == waiting time) the customer close the call.

AgentType.name: PlaceCallUnit
AgentType.documentation: When a call is arriving the Place Call Unit rejects it if is busy or send it to the IVR Unit if is not busy. The Place Call Unit is busy if the number of calls from its queue is = 10.

ReactionRule.name: PlaceCallUnit_Rule
ReactionRule.documentation: When a new Customer Call Arrives to the Place Call Unit, the call is rejected if the pcuQueue is busy (> 10) and the number of losted calls is increased by 1, otherwise the call is added to the queue and the queue length is increased by 1.

AgentType.name: DepartmentCallsManager
AgentType.documentation: Department Calls Manager agents are managing the queue of customers who are waiting for a free receptionist of that branch to answer them. We have a DepartmentCallsManager for the Car-Stereo branch and another for the Other-Products branch.

AgentType.name: CallsReceptionist
AgentType.documentation: The Calls Receptionist agents are processing the incoming customer calls for each branch.

documentation.description: The receptionist requests a new call from queue since it is free.

EnvironmentRule.name: CreateNewCustomer_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: A new customer is created at random times by this reaction rule when a CreateNewCustomer event apears.

Hint.Text: The total number of customer calls by the Place Call Unit.
The number of rejected customer calls by the Place Call Unit.
The number of customer calls waiting in Car-Stereo branch.
The number of processed calls in Car-Stereo branch.
The number of customer calls waiting in Other-Products branch.
The number of processed calls in Other-Products branch.
The number of lost calls in Car-Stereo branch.
The number of lost calls in Other-Products branch.
The average time that customers wait in Car-Stereo.
The average time that customers wait in Other-Products.
